tool_description: Generates relevant and trending hashtags for social media content based on the content text, platform, and target audience to maximize reach and engagement.

content_text.description: The main text content of the social media post

platform.description: Target platform (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Empty content: Content text cannot be empty
Invalid hashtag count: Count must be between 1 and 30
Content too short: Provide more detailed content for better hashtag suggestions
usage: Provide the content text and target platform to generate relevant hashtags. Optionally specify the number of hashtags needed and whether to include trending ones.

trending_hashtags.description: Currently trending hashtags included in the list

popularity_scores.description: Popularity scores (0-100) for each generated hashtag
